subject: Re: [junit] Re: Dave's weird code indentation
msgSnippet: Well, you *could* fake out random(), but that usually leads to writing a determinstic pseudo-random number generator, when usually all that s required is a a
messageBody:
Well, you *could* fake out random(), but that usually leads to writing a determinstic pseudo-random number generator, when usually all that's required is a a few different sequences of numbers passed into a method.

Interested parties should consult the "Fischer Random Chess" thread on the TDD group.

So said Dave Astels on 3/12/2003 --------------------
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains@r...> wrote:
> Maybe just odd numbers. I'd find 9 weird, too.

Interesting.. no one so far has mentioned the code.. just the indentation.

Or.. maybe I put 5 in to distract people so they wouldn't look closely
at my code :-o

Dave
